means: 耻骨区，生殖器官，腰与腿之间的部分

sentence.Network_en: He walked along , gently kicking ; his loins really did ache!
sentence.Network_cn: 一边走一边踢腿, 胯骨 轴的确还有点发酸!

sentence.Network_en: His loins are warm and a lazy delight drifts along his body.
sentence.Network_cn: 他此刻正动了情,一种软绵绵,甜丝丝的感觉传遍了他的全身.

sentence.Network_en: The sun feels almost unbearably delicious on his loins.
sentence.Network_cn: 太阳晒得他心里怪痒痒的,弄得他都快按捺不住了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: A cloth worn to cover the loins ; a loincloth ., 围腰布围在腰中的布 ; 围裙.
...loin　① （猪）背肉〔自肩部到腰部的背肉，包括胸、腹腔上部的肋条肉〕 ② 大排骨loins　胸排loligo　枪乌贼［Loligo］
at the same time spake the LORD by Isaiah the son of Amoz , saying , Go and loose the sackcloth from off thy loins , and put off thy shoe from thy foot .那时耶和华晓谕亚摩斯的儿子以赛亚说，你去解掉你腰间的麻布，脱下你脚上的鞋。
they shall have linen bonnets upon their heads , and shall have linen breeches upon their loins ; they shall not gird themselves with any thing that causeth sweat .18他们头上要戴细麻布裹头巾，腰穿细麻布裤子。不可穿使身体出汗的衣服。

frozen lizard fish 冻沙鲮鱼frozen loin 冻大排frozen long tailed anchovy 冻凤尾鱼
从牛的前腰脊肉(Strip Loin)部位制成纽约克牛排，油花分布均匀、肉质香甜，以高温碳焙，充分把肉质的香嫩、多汁，保留于牛排中…
纽约克牛排 (Strip Loin)属前腰脊部肉，肉质与肋眼近似，其油筋分布于尾端，不像肋眼油筋是贯穿分布中间，其形状也较肋眼狭长。

entry.tran: 耻骨区；私处；（尤指）性器官
entry.def: Someone's loins are the front part of their body between their waist and legs, especially their sexual parts.
Loin or a loin is a piece of meat which comes from the back or sides of an animal, quite near the tail end.

example.ex: Heat the honey and brush it on to the outside of the loin.
example.tran: 将蜂蜜加热后涂抹在腰子的表面。

entry.tran: 准备采取（困难或危险的）行动
entry.def: If you gird your loins, you prepare to do something difficult or dangerous.

means.word_mean: 1. the lower part of the abdomen just above the external genital organs
2. the region of the hips and groin and lower abdomen
